nodes.text: Star Wars: Stealth Mission Book and Model

Star Wars: Stealth Mission Book and Model is a canon children's activity set in the Star Wars Construction Books series. The set includes an activity book and miniature T-70 X-wing starfighter paper model. It was written by Katrina Pallant and published by Egmont UK Ltd on September 1, 2017 as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
Studio Fun International published an edition for the United States on August 21, 2018, titled Star Wars: X-Wing Book and Model.
Join Poe and BB-8 to relive the action and adventure of Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Contains fun facts and stats about the characters, ships and locations from the smash hit movie.
Read the book then press out the pieces to create your own mini X-wing model, perfect for recreating Poe's battle scenes.
